00011 #include <algorithm>
00012 #include <blond/constants.h>
00013 #include <blond/llrf/PhaseNoise.h>
00014 #include <blond/math_functions.h>
00015 #include <random>
00016 
00017 void PhaseNoise::spectrum_to_phase_noise(f_vector_t &t, f_vector_t &dphi,
00018         const f_vector_t &freq_array,
00019         const f_vector_t &ReS,
00020         PhaseNoise::transform_t transform)
00021 {
00022 
00023     // Resolution in time domain
00024     const auto ReSLen = ReS.size();
00025     const auto f_max = freq_array.back();
00026     uint nt = 0;
00027     uint dt = 0;
00028 
00029     if (transform == transform_t::transform_none ||
00030             transform == transform_t::r) {
00031         nt = 2 * (ReSLen - 1);
00032         dt = 1 / (2 * f_max);
00033     } else if (transform == transform_t::c) {
00034         nt = ReSLen;
00035         dt = 1 / f_max;
00036     } else {
00037         std::cerr << "ERROR: The choise of Fourier transform for the\n"
00038                   << "RF noise generation could not be recognized.\n"
00039                   << "Use 'r' or 'c'.\n";
00040         exit(-1);
00041     }
00042 
00043     // Generate white noise in time domain
00044     f_vector_t r1(nt);
00045     f_vector_t r2(nt);
00046 
00047     if (fSeed1 < 0 || fSeed2 < 0) {
00048         f_vector_t random;
00049         // std::string home = util::GETENV("TEST_FILES");
00050         util::read_vector_from_file(random, TEST_FILES "/normal_distribution.dat");
00051         for (uint i = 0; i < r1.size(); i++) {
00052             r1[i] = random[(2 * i) % random.size()];
00053             r2[i] = random[(2 * i + 1) % random.size()];
00054         }
00055     } else {
00056         std::default_random_engine gen(fSeed1);
00057         std::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(0, 1);
00058         for (auto &v : r1) v = dist(gen);
00059         gen.seed(fSeed2);
00060         for (auto &v : r2) v = dist(gen);
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (transform == transform_t::transform_none ||
00064             transform == transform_t::r) {
00065         f_vector_t Gt(nt);
00066 
00067         auto factor = 2 * constant::pi;
00068         auto f1 = [factor](ftype x) { return std::cos(factor * x); };
00069         std::transform(r1.begin(), r1.end(), r1.begin(), f1);
00070 
00071         auto f2 = [](ftype x) { return std::sqrt(-2 * std::log(x)); };
00072         std::transform(r2.begin(), r2.end(), r2.begin(), f2);
00073 
00074         std::transform(r1.begin(), r1.end(), r2.begin(), Gt.begin(),
00075                        std::multiplies<ftype>());
00076 
00077         // FFT to frequency domain
00078         complex_vector_t Gf;
00079         fft::rfft(Gt, Gf);
00080 
00081         // Multiply by desired noise probability density
00082         factor = 2 * f_max;
00083         auto f3 = [factor](ftype x) { return std::sqrt(factor * x); };
00084 
00085         r1.resize(ReS.size());
00086         std::transform(ReS.begin(), ReS.end(), r1.begin(), f3);
00087 
00088         auto f4 = [](ftype r, complex_t z) { return r * z; };
00089         std::transform(r1.begin(), r1.end(), Gf.begin(), Gf.begin(), f4);
00090 
00091         // fft back to time domain to get final phase shift
00092         Gt.clear();
00093         fft::irfft(Gf, Gt);
00094 
00095         // Use only real part of the phase shift and normalize
00096         t.resize(nt);
00097         mymath::linspace(t.data(), 0, nt * dt, nt);
00098 
00099         auto f6 = [](complex_t z) { return z.real(); };
00100 
00101         dphi.resize(Gt.size());
00102 
00103         std::transform(Gt.begin(), Gt.end(), dphi.begin(), f6);
00104 
00105     } else if (transform == transform_t::c) {
00106 
00107         complex_vector_t Gt(nt);
00108 
00109         const complex_t factor = 2 * constant::pi * complex_t(0, 1);
00110         auto f1 = [factor](ftype x) { return std::exp(factor * x); };
00111         std::transform(r1.begin(), r1.end(), Gt.begin(), f1);
00112 
00113         auto f2 = [](ftype x) { return std::sqrt(-2 * std::log(x)); };
00114         std::transform(r2.begin(), r2.end(), r2.begin(), f2);
00115 
00116         auto f3 = [](complex_t a, ftype b) { return a * b; };
00117         std::transform(Gt.begin(), Gt.end(), r2.begin(), Gt.begin(), f3);
00118 
00119         // FFT to frequency domain
00120         complex_vector_t Gf;
00121         fft::fft(Gt, Gf);
00122 
00123         // Multiply by desired noise probability density
00124 
00125         auto factor2 = f_max;
00126         auto f4 = [factor2](ftype x) { return std::sqrt(factor2 * x); };
00127 
00128         r1.resize(ReS.size());
00129         std::transform(ReS.begin(), ReS.end(), r1.begin(), f4);
00130 
00131         auto f5 = [](ftype r, complex_t z) { return r * z; };
00132 
00133         std::transform(r1.begin(), r1.end(), Gf.begin(), Gf.begin(), f5);
00134         // fft back to time domain to get final phase shift
00135         Gt.clear();
00136         fft::ifft(Gf, Gt);
00137 
00138         t.resize(nt);
00139         mymath::linspace(t.data(), 0, nt * dt, nt);
00140 
00141         auto f6 = [](complex_t z) { return z.real(); };
00142 
00143         dphi.resize(Gt.size());
00144 
00145         std::transform(Gt.begin(), Gt.end(), dphi.begin(), f6);
00146     }
00147 }
00148 
00149 f_vector_t PhaseNoise::spectrum_generation(int k, int nt, ftype df, ftype ampl,
00150         f_vector_t freq,
00151         predistortion_t predistortion)
00152 {
00153     int nmin = std::floor(fFMin * fFs[k] / df);
00154     int nmax = std::ceil(fFMax * fFs[k] / df);
00155     int nf = nt / 2 + 1;
00156 
00157     f_vector_t spectrum;
00158 
00159     if (fPredistortion == predistortion_t::exponential) {
00160         spectrum.resize(nmin, 0);
00161 
00162         auto v1 = mymath::arange<ftype>(0, nmax - nmin + 1);
00163 
00164         auto f1 = [ampl, nmax, nmin](ftype x) {
00165             return ampl * std::exp(std::log(100.0) * x / (nmax - nmin));
00166         };
00167 
00168         std::transform(v1.begin(), v1.end(), v1.begin(), f1);
00169 
00170         spectrum.insert(spectrum.end(), v1.begin(), v1.end());
00171 
00172         spectrum.resize(nf, 0);
00173     } else if (fPredistortion == predistortion_t::linear) {
00174         spectrum.resize(nmin, 0);
00175 
00176         f_vector_t v1(nmax - nmin + 1);
00177         mymath::linspace(v1.data(), 0, ampl, nmax - nmin + 1);
00178 
00179         spectrum.insert(spectrum.end(), v1.begin(), v1.end());
00180 
00181         spectrum.resize(nf, 0);
00182     } else if (fPredistortion == predistortion_t::hyperbolic) {
00183         spectrum.resize(nmin, 0);
00184 
00185         auto v1 = mymath::arange<ftype>(nmin, nmax + 1);
00186 
00187         auto f1 = [ampl, nmax, nmin](ftype x) {
00188             return ampl * 1.0 / (1 + 0.99 * (nmin - x) / (nmax - nmin));
00189         };
00190 
00191         std::transform(v1.begin(), v1.end(), v1.begin(), f1);
00192         spectrum.insert(spectrum.end(), v1.begin(), v1.end());
00193 
00194         spectrum.resize(nf, 0);
00195     } else if (fPredistortion == predistortion_t::weightfunction) {
00196         spectrum.resize(nmin, 0);
00197 
00198         // frequency relative to fs0
00199         f_vector_t frel(&freq[nmin], &freq[nmax + 1]);
00200 
00201         std::transform(frel.begin(), frel.end(), frel.begin(),
00202                        std::bind2nd(std::divides<ftype>(), fFs[k]));
00203 
00204         // truncate center freqs
00205         auto f1 = [](ftype x) { return x > 0.999 ? 0.999 : x; };
00206         std::transform(frel.begin(), frel.end(), frel.begin(), f1);
00207         // rms bunch length in rad corresponding to 1.2 ns
00208         auto sigma = 0.754;
00209         auto gamma = 0.577216;
00210         auto pi = constant::pi;
00211         auto f2 = [sigma, gamma, pi](ftype x) {
00212             auto sigma2 = sigma * sigma;
00213             return std::pow(4 * pi * x / sigma2, 2) *
00214                    std::exp(-16 * (1 - x) / sigma2) +
00215                    0.25 * pow(1 +
00216                               8 * x / sigma2 *
00217                               std::exp(-8 * (1 - x) / sigma2) *
00218                               (gamma + std::log(8 * (1 - x) / sigma2) +
00219                                8 * (1 - x) / sigma2),
00220                               2);
00221         };
00222 
00223         const auto factor = ampl / f2(frel[0]);
00224         for (uint i = 0; i < frel.size(); ++i) {
00225             frel[i] = factor * f2(frel[i]);
00226             // frel[i] *= factor;
00227         }
00228 
00229         spectrum.insert(spectrum.end(), frel.begin(), frel.end());
00230 
00231         spectrum.resize(nf, 0);
00232 
00233     } else {
00234         spectrum.resize(nmin, 0);
00235         spectrum.resize(nmax + 1, ampl);
00236         spectrum.resize(nf, 0);
00237     }
00238 
00239     return spectrum;
00240 
00241     // std::cout << "mean dphi : " << mymath::mean(fDphi.data(), fDphi.size())
00242     // << "\n";
00243 
00244     // std::cout << "mean dphi : " << mymath::mean(fDphi.data(), fDphi.size())
00245     // << "\n";
00246 }
00247 
00248 PSBPhaseNoiseInjection::PSBPhaseNoiseInjection(
00249     ftype delta_f, uint corr_time, ftype fmin, ftype fmax,
00250     ftype initial_amplitude, int seed1, int seed2,
00251     predistortion_t predistortion, rescale_ampl_t rescale_amplitude)
00252 {
00253     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00254     auto GP = Context::GP;
00255 
00256     fDeltaF = delta_f;
00257     fCorr = corr_time;
00258     fFMin = fmin;
00259     fFMax = fmax;
00260     fAi = initial_amplitude;
00261     fPredistortion = predistortion;
00262     fSeed1 = seed1;
00263     fSeed2 = seed2;
00264     fNTurns = GP->n_turns;
00265     fDphi.resize(fNTurns + 1, 0);
00266     fRescaleAmpl = rescale_amplitude;
00267 
00268     fFs.resize(RfP->omega_s0.size());
00269     std::transform(RfP->omega_s0.begin(), RfP->omega_s0.end(), fFs.begin(),
00270                    std::bind2nd(std::divides<ftype>(), 2 * constant::pi));
00271 }
00272 
00273 PSBPhaseNoiseInjection::~PSBPhaseNoiseInjection() { fft::destroy_plans(); }
00274 
00275 void PSBPhaseNoiseInjection::generate()
00276 {
00277     auto GP = Context::GP;
00278 
00279     for (uint i = 0; i < fNTurns / fCorr; ++i) {
00280 
00281         // Scale amplitude to keep area (phase noise amplitude) constant
00282         uint k = i * fCorr; // Current time step
00283         ftype f_max = GP->f_rev[k] / 2;
00284         ftype f_s0 = fFs[k];
00285 
00286         int n_points_pos_f_incl_zero = (int)(f_max / fDeltaF) + 2;
00287         int nt = 2 * (n_points_pos_f_incl_zero - 1);
00288         nt = mymath::next_regular(nt);
00289         n_points_pos_f_incl_zero = nt / 2 + 1;
00290         ftype df = f_max / (n_points_pos_f_incl_zero - 1);
00291 
00292         ftype ampl = 0.0;
00293         if (fRescaleAmpl == rescale_ampl_t::with_sync_freq)
00294             ampl = fAi * fFs[0] / f_s0;
00295         else if (fRescaleAmpl == rescale_ampl_t::no_scaling)
00296             ampl = fAi;
00297         else {
00298             std::cerr << "ERROR: Illegal Value\n"
00299                       << "fRescaleAmpl should be one of "
00300                       << "with_sync_freq or no_scaling\n";
00301         }
00302 
00303         f_vector_t freq(n_points_pos_f_incl_zero);
00304         mymath::linspace(freq.data(), 0, f_max, n_points_pos_f_incl_zero);
00305 
00306         auto spectrum =
00307             spectrum_generation(k, nt, df, ampl, freq, fPredistortion);
00308 
00309         f_vector_t noise_t, noise_dphi;
00310         spectrum_to_phase_noise(noise_t, noise_dphi, freq, spectrum);
00311 
00312         fSeed1 += 239;
00313         fSeed2 += 158;
00314 
00315         // Fill phase noise array
00316 
00317         const uint kmax =
00318             i < fNTurns / fCorr - 1 ? (i + 1) * fCorr : fNTurns + 1;
00319 
00320         std::copy(noise_dphi.begin(), noise_dphi.begin() + kmax - k,
00321                   fDphi.begin() + k);
00322 
00323         auto rms_noise =
00324             mymath::standard_deviation(noise_dphi.data(), noise_dphi.size());
00325         // std::cout << "RF noise for time step " << noise_t[1]
00326         //           << " s (iter " << i << ") has r.m.s phase "
00327         //           << rms_noise << " rad (" << rms_noise * 180 / constant::pi
00328         //           << " deg)\n";
00329     }
00330 }
00331 
00332 LHCFlatSpectrum::LHCFlatSpectrum(uint time_points, uint corr_time, ftype fmin,
00333                                  ftype fmax, ftype initial_amplitude, int seed1,
00334                                  int seed2, predistortion_t predistortion)
00335 {
00336     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00337     auto GP = Context::GP;
00338 
00339     fNt = time_points;
00340     fCorr = corr_time;
00341     fFMin = fmin;
00342     fFMax = fmax;
00343     fAi = initial_amplitude;
00344     fPredistortion = predistortion;
00345     fSeed1 = seed1;
00346     fSeed2 = seed2;
00347     fNTurns = GP->n_turns;
00348     fDphi.resize(fNTurns + 1, 0);
00349 
00350     if (fPredistortion != predistortion_t::predistortion_none) {
00351         // Overwrite frequencies
00352         fFMin = 0.8571;
00353         fFMax = 1.001;
00354     }
00355 
00356     if (fNt < 2 * fCorr) {
00357         std::cerr << "ERROR: Need more time point in LHCFlatSpectrum.\n";
00358         exit(-1);
00359     }
00360 
00361     // Synchrotron frequency array
00362     f_vector_t phis(fNTurns + 1);
00363     calc_phi_s(phis.data(), RfP,
00364                RfParameters::accelerating_systems_t::as_single);
00365 
00366     fFs.resize(phis.size());
00367 
00368     for (uint i = 0; i < fFs.size(); ++i) {
00369         fFs[i] =
00370             constant::c / GP->ring_circumference *
00371             std::sqrt(RfP->harmonic[RfP->idx][i] * RfP->voltage[RfP->idx][i] *
00372                       std::fabs(RfP->eta_0(i) * std::cos(phis[i])) /
00373                       (2 * constant::pi * RfP->energy(i)));
00374     }
00375 }
00376 
00377 LHCFlatSpectrum::~LHCFlatSpectrum() { fft::destroy_plans(); }
00378 
00379 void LHCFlatSpectrum::generate()
00380 {
00381 
00382     auto GP = Context::GP;
00383 
00384     for (uint i = 0; i < fNTurns / fCorr; ++i) {
00385 
00386         // Scale amplitude to keep area (phase noise amplitude) constant
00387         int k = i * fCorr; // Current time step
00388         auto ampl = fAi * fFs[0] / fFs[k];
00389 
00390         // Calculate the frequency step
00391         int nf = fNt / 2 + 1; // #points in frequency domain
00392         ftype df = GP->f_rev[k] / fNt;
00393 
00394         f_vector_t freq(nf);
00395         mymath::linspace(freq.data(), 0, nf * df, nf);
00396 
00397         auto spectrum =
00398             spectrum_generation(k, fNt, df, ampl, freq, fPredistortion);
00399 
00400         f_vector_t noise_t, noise_dphi;
00401         spectrum_to_phase_noise(noise_t, noise_dphi, freq, spectrum);
00402 
00403         // spectrum_to_phase_noise();
00404         fSeed1 += 239;
00405         fSeed2 += 158;
00406 
00407         // Fill phase noise array
00408 
00409         const uint kmax =
00410             i < fNTurns / fCorr - 1 ? (i + 1) * fCorr : fNTurns + 1;
00411 
00412         for (uint i = 0; i < kmax - k; ++i)
00413             fDphi[i + k] = noise_dphi[i];
00414 
00415         auto rms_noise =
00416             mymath::standard_deviation(noise_dphi.data(), noise_dphi.size());
00417 
00418         // std::cout << "RF noise for time step " << noise_t[1]
00419         //           << " s (iter " << i << ") has r.m.s phase "
00420         //           << rms_noise << " rad (" << rms_noise * 180 / constant::pi
00421         //           << " deg)\n";
00422     }
00423 }
